Row.Text: Across the trackless seas the double-hulled Tongan ships sail, guided by nothing but the stars. The singerâ€™s chant drives them forward, to seek new sea-stone harbors, new atolls and new fishing grounds. Listen to the slit-drum, and the rush of waves on the hull - a new shore awaits.
The Tehina Unique Scout can enter Deep Ocean even in Antiquity. Use them to explore distant coastlines and find new Independent Powers to befriend.
